group.note0: Moving: 01:31, Elapsed: 02:37 Last day of the year, first relax day in paradise Finally a relax day for just living. Nice big Ojochal loop + Pancito Café social stop meeting Erica and Scott before they head back to Ontario. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:33], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [12:09]

Moving: 01:14, Elapsed: 02:50 Vuelta Perezoso Pleasant end of day ride. Costa Rica cycling lesson #1: don't leave your helmet on the ground where the piss ants can invade it, especially in the dark Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [14:11]
Swim 500m

Moving: 01:57, Elapsed: 02:46 Vuelta Ojochal + Playas Ventana y Tortuga Nice morning ride with overcast coolness in the low 20's. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:10], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [15:02]
Moving: 01:03, Elapsed: 01:07 Vuelta Perezoso Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:30]

Moving: 02:06, Elapsed: 03:57 1 Iguana Negra, 4 cruces de arroyos con los pies secos Vuelta Ojochal + Playa Ventana Totally pleasant ride with visit to Pancito. Ran out of food energy on last wall up to fase 11. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [17:44]
Moving: 01:00, Elapsed: 01:46 Vuelta Perezoso Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:02]

Moving: 02:12, Elapsed: 03:44 Vuelta Ojochal, Calle las Brisas Another nice ride, with some exploring requiring a wee bit of skillZ Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [17:14], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [12:17]
Moving: 01:11, Elapsed: 01:28 Vuelta Perezoso

Moving: 01:55, Elapsed: 03:27 Uvita, la Cola de la Ballena, Ojochal con 7.5km Arena Real™ Conduzca a Uvita para dejar el carro de alquiler. Luego encantador paseo en la playa a la Cola de la Ballena. Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [15:19]
Moving: 01:06, Elapsed: 01:12 1 Iguana Verde Ojochal a Uvita para recoger nuestra carro de reparación
Queasy tummy

Container contents arrive and are unloaded at Ojochal house.
Queasy tummy continues.
Moving: 00:13, Elapsed: 00:19 EBike: Enfriamiento rápido nadar en el Rio Balso Primer paseo en eBike Biker energy: 19 Wh; max 286 W
Moving: 01:54, Elapsed: 03:01 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal con eBike Este es definitivamente territorio eBike! Biker energy: 188 Wh; max 413 W

Moving: 02:26, Elapsed: 03:52 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal y Rio Pinuela eBike es increíble para explorar. Conocí a Victor (actually Vidal), dueño de una granja en Calle las Brisas. Descubierto dos senderos de acceso directo. Biker energy: 195 Wh; max 430 W

Moving: 02:31, Elapsed: 06:40 Vuelta de Ojochal, Rio Pinuela, Uvita La tija de sillín rota me obligó a montar pBike. Súper gran paseo y fiesta de explorar en Uvita. Me sentí genial hoy. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:29]
Moving: 01:47, Elapsed: 03:46 Vuelta de Ojochal Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:16], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:37]
Moving: 01:28, Elapsed: 02:22 Puesta del sol a la Playa Tortuga First Radrunner ride over 3 km.

Moving: 00:59, Elapsed: 01:24 Vuelta de Ojochal con Nancita, y llanta pinchada Uno demasiados pinchazos para este neumático, es hora de retirarlo. Mañana bueno sin nubes. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:42]
Moving: 00:41, Elapsed: 01:06 Uvita explorar mientras el carro es atendido
Moving: 01:27, Elapsed: 02:05 Vuelta de Ojochal Día caluroso, terminado drenado Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:28]

Moving: 01:49, Elapsed: 03:35 Vuelta de Ojocal y Rio Pinuela con Tallboy, con nadar en el océano, el río y la piscina Es la primera vez en el Tallboy en mucho tiempo. Creo que esto es más adecuado para las carreteras locales que el Highball. 20 min hablando con Naomi, 20 min en Playa Ventana, 35 min en Pancito, y 10 min en Rio Balso Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [17:21], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:29]

Moving: 01:45, Elapsed: 02:23 Vuelta de Ojochal + Playa Tortuga Norte, con 2.4 km de arena Favoreciendo a la bicicleta de montaña, pero necesito más gears. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:55], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [15:17]
Moving: 01:37, Elapsed: 53:10 Vuelta de Ojochal y Playa Tortuga Norte Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:42], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [12:31]
Moving: 01:16, Elapsed: 01:43 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal y Perezoso con Nancita Ebike es muy devertido. Rode 25 km. Biker energy: 124 Wh; max 526 W

Moving: 04:33, Elapsed: 05:55 EBike: La Larga Ruta de Ojochal a Uvita Primer gran paseo en Costa Rica. Buen tiempo, nublado y bajo 20s. Bonitos caminos en la Cordillera Costera. Este paseo requería una eBike. La subida tenía pendientes sostenidas superiores al 20%, algunos de los 25%, y una pareja con un 29%. Después de esto, el 12% parecía plano! Se quedó sin batería, hasta un 10% en Uvita. Biker 440W, Motor 610W. Biker energy: 451 Wh; max 492 W
Moving: 01:45, Elapsed: 03:54 EBike: Calle de Perezoso y south to Tres Rios Seatpost bolt broke. Then the other one. Biker energy: 171 Wh; max 408 W

Moving: 03:01, Elapsed: 05:09 Calle la Unión loop, playa, part way out Calle Santo Domingo Short swim in Rio Uvita. Nice ride. Right sit bone really sore today, depending on position. Uh oh. 6 Pizotes, con Nancita y 5.4 km de Arena
Moving: 01:37, Elapsed: 03:01 Vuelta de Ojochal Testing the right sit bone, it was only a bit bothersome. Cleaned El Paso de Naomi (probably only 2nd time) Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:41]

Moving: 01:19, Elapsed: 03:00 Vuelta de Ojochal con Nancita Tallboy es super bueno, y paseo en bici fue agradable. Nancita tiene una llanta pinchada delantera de su eBike. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:14], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:02]

Moving: 02:14, Elapsed: 03:41 Vuelta de Ojochal, Rio Pinuela, Playa Ventana, Tortuga Norte con David y Frank Conoció a David y Frank cerca de Río Tortuga y se dirigió a playa con ellos. Agradable para montar con otros ciclistas. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:33], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [16:06]
Moving: 01:32, Elapsed: 03:21 Vuelta de Ojochal y Playa Tortuga Norte 2 Iguanas Negros Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:44], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [12:59]
Moving: 02:28, Elapsed: 03:32 Paso de Naomi, Rio Pinuela, Uvita playa Paso de Naomi, Rio Pinuela, Uvita playa. Nice ride. 2 iguanas verdes. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [17:09]
Moving: 01:56, Elapsed: 03:11 Vuelta de Ojochal y Rio Pinuela con Nancita Consado hoy Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:51], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [15:53]
Moving: 01:47, Elapsed: 02:58 Ojochal a Uvita a través de Rio Pinuela y Playa Colonia Nice ride. A bit of sit bone pain. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:22]
Moving: 01:52, Elapsed: 02:53 Cascada El Pavon Nice ride. Tallboy rear tire EOL bulge and flat.
Moving: 01:50, Elapsed: 03:11 Vuelta Perezoso y El Pavon New rear tire day. Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:55]
Moving: 01:22, Elapsed: 03:10 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Biker energy: 137 Wh; max 474 W
Moving: 01:34, Elapsed: 03:08 El Pavon y regresar 2 Pizotes, 1 Cascada Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [14:00]
Moving: 01:32, Elapsed: 11:45 Vuelta de Ojochal y Rio Pinuela Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:34], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [14:11]
Swim: 0.5km Afternoon Swim, moving time 00:20
Moving: 00:56, Elapsed: 01:23 Vuelta de Ojochal 1/2 Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:13] Moving: 01:05, Elapsed: 01:34 Tortuga Norte y Regresar a la casa Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [17:09]
Moving: 01:33, Elapsed: 02:45 Vuelta de Ojochal y Puesta del Sol en Tortuga Norte Nice evening ride Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [14:45], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [14:04]

Moving: 02:16, Elapsed: 03:44 Vuelta de Ojochal, Rio Pinuela, Tortuga Norte con 2.5 km Arena Nice ride. Nancita joined me from Pancito, and back to Plaza Ventana, and then home, providing a nice pace. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:12], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [12:52]
Moving: 01:38, Elapsed: 03:39 Vuelta de Ojochal y Tortuga Norte Okay ride. Cleaned the Rio Bolso climb, but not the route to Naomi's hill. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:15]
Moving: 01:55, Elapsed: 03:25 Perezoso y El Pavon Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:06]
Moving: 02:13, Elapsed: 04:52 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal para Rio Pinuela Fvcking seatpost bolt broke again. Fvck. 1 Agutí, 1 Iguana Verde Biker energy: 500 Wh (this is wrong)
Moving: 02:16, Elapsed: 03:17 EBike: Explorar la fase 9, Vuelta de Ojochal y Rio Pinuela 1 Pezote, 1 Iguana Verde. New seatpost bolts for today's ride. Biker energy: 537 Wh (this is wrong)

Moving: 01:47, Elapsed: 02:49 Uvita a Ojochal con 3 Nazis de la Playa Nice ride, but a bit beaten by the midday sun on the carretera #35. Also got escorted from the National Park by 3 Nazis de la Playa. Some gear changing issues, and a big rear Nano blow out 2 km from home.

Moving: 01:57, Elapsed: 03:41 Lavado facial de araña tejedora orbe Comienza en Coronado, senderos selváticos a El Pavón y luego regresa a casa. 5 km en 1h15 y 1 botella de agua, duro. Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [14:19]
Can't turn on the Levo. Sigh. Moving: 01:31, Elapsed: 03:37 Vulte de Ojochal Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:29], up El Paso de Naomi [4:04], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [15:17]

Moving: 01:30, Elapsed: 01:42 Vuelta de Ojochal y Rio Pinuela Really nice 2pm ride with clouds and 26˚C to start, and lovely 22˚C and pouring rain to end. Bliss on a bike. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [15:11], up El Paso de Naomi [3:59], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [12:42]

Moving: 01:50, Elapsed: 03:32 Vuelta de Ojochal y Playa Tortuga Norte Buen viaje. Pedales planos usados por primera vez en años. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [16:14], up El Paso de Naomi [4:21], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:40]
Moving: 01:36, Elapsed: 02:48 Perezoso y las dos Playas Tortugas Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:22]

Moving: 01:13, Elapsed: 01:51 EBike: BIFF Biker energy: 283 Wh
Loop from San Isidro, then triple biff on red clay. First on the right side, second on the left side and break my left collarbone, third as soon as I stoop up on my shoes.
Walk: 3.92km Caminar Fase 11, moving time 00:54
Second x-ray shows calcification of collarbone is starting. shoulder still hurts.
Shoulder feeling pretty good today.
Shoulder sore from sleeping.

Moving: 00:46, Elapsed: 02:55 EBike: Los Gatos Loco and return 6 weeks since clavicle broken, went for an easy eBike spin to move the legs. Felt good and didn't bother the clavicle. Biker energy: 131 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 00:29, Elapsed: 02:01 EBike: Los Gatos Locos Biker energy: 105 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 00:23, Elapsed: 00:27 EBike: A Coronado para recuperar el carro Biker energy: 106 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 00:53, Elapsed: 02:19 EBike: Uvita Noodle de Mañana, con Vincent y April Biker energy: 107 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 00:32, Elapsed: 02:29 EBike: Mercado de Ojochal y Los Gatos Locos Lunch with Heather, Derek, Vincent, April Biker energy: 135 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 00:26, Elapsed: 00:54 EBike: To Pancito Seatpost bolt breaks, replace it, then another one breaks. Biker energy: 83 Wh; max undefined W

Moving: 01:12, Elapsed: 01:39 EBike: Vuelta Cuidadoso de Ojochal Easy does it. First rear seatpost bolt broke or rattled off within 6 km. Second rear bolt broke or rattled off within 5 km. Riding still a bit much for the collarbone, so no green light yet. Biker energy: 263 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 00:02, Elapsed: 01:25 EBike: Visitar a Los Vecinos Biker energy: 7 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 01:13, Elapsed: 01:56 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal con Nancita Almost taken out on a downhill by a Pizoti. Doing a bit more pedal pushing today. No seatpost bolts broken. Biker energy: 268 Wh
Moving: 01:12, Elapsed: 02:26 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Visit Nancita at yoga, then Pancitos. Biker energy: 113 Wh; max 340 W
Moving: 01:33, Elapsed: 02:12 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal y Playa Tortuga Norte con 3 km Arena Nice ride, putting in more effort. 415W for 5s, 290W for 30s. Biker 127Wh. Biker energy: 130 Wh; max 426 W

Moving: 01:17, Elapsed: 01:28 EBike: Vuelta Perezoso, Punta Mala con Mucha Lluvia Tropical Nice ride, then it started to pour moderately. Still a good ride. Drivetrain not happy on Rock N Roll gold. Levo battery indicator on most of the time, but flickered off a few times. Biker energy: 133 Wh; max 374 W

Moving: 00:43, Elapsed: 00:55 EBike: Fvcking Specialized eBike Reliability TCU failure, turned around. Assist would just cut out, and show as zero on TCU display. Then it would cut in, including display, and battery display would go off. More off then on. Biker energy: 74 Wh; max 376 W

Moving: 01:44, Elapsed: 02:48 El Pavon First ride on regular bike since collarbone. Good effort but tired at end. Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [14:07]
Nancy takes Levo to Bike Planet

Moving: 01:53, Elapsed: 03:37 Très Rio Bici de Ruta Road bike, and oh my am I weak! But still did it, and felt good about the ride. Standing while climbing hurts the collarbone, even at 9 weeks. Malo.
Walk: 4.21km Playa Chaman con Nancita y Andre, moving time 00:52
Moving: 01:05, Elapsed: 01:50 Vuelta de Perezoso Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [14:57]

Moving: 01:24, Elapsed: 02:12 Vuelta de Ojochal First loop on regular bike since collarbone event. Didn't do too badly, but needed to walk the two steep bits on the loop. Ran out of blood sugar at the end and became spastic-muscled. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [18:22], up El Paso de Naomi [5:28]

Moving: 01:28, Elapsed: 01:40 Vuelta de Ojochal Getting a bit stronger. Tallboy free hub started sticking and carrying the chain forward. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [18:15], up El Paso de Naomi [5:11], up Ojochal Calle del Puente [15:38]

Moving: 02:17, Elapsed: 03:28 Vuelta de Cortés con Bici de Ruta Paseo llano a Cortés y regreso en bicicleta de ruta. No quiero ir más allá dado mi estado físico. Todavía un hombro dolorido. La Serotta es muy buena.

Moving: 02:03, Elapsed: 03:01 EBike: Vuleta de Punta Mala Arriba y Tres Rios Changed back to the Specialized seatpost before today's ride. No problems with the old post. No mechanicals. It was so nice to have reliability! Biker energy: 532 Wh; max undefined W

Moving: 01:20, Elapsed: 02:13 EBike: Coronado y CW Vuelta de Ojochal. Met Nancy at Vivero de Costa, then road the Ojochal loop. No mechanicals again.
Biker energy: 55 Wh; max 339 W
Moving: 02:23, Elapsed: 03:37 EBike: Vuelta de Tres Rios y San Buenas Nice ride, exploring new roads. Motor shut off once on it's own. Biker energy: 196 Wh; max 414 W

Moving: 00:35, Elapsed: 00:37 EBike: Ojochal Avenida Principale To Tony's and entrance and return, trying to catch Mango John Biker energy: 53 Wh; max 392 W
Moving: 00:59, Elapsed: 03:02 Cervezas 7 Burittos en Stams y Los Gatos Locos con Nancita

Moving: 02:20, Elapsed: 02:58 EBike: Ojochal a Uvita 1 Serpiente. Thick overcast, occasional slight rain day. Good ride exploring between Ojochal and Uvita via Pinuela, and Union in CCW direction. Get car drive home. Biker energy: 183 Wh; max 458 W

Moving: 03:43, Elapsed: 05:26 EBike: Super Bueno Uvita y Ojochal Grande. Rode upper Ojochal across to Pinuela, then Playa Chaman, Felipe's, Calle la Farralla to ford and return, then Union to Manoas to see a Felipe property, then along Chaman and roads back to Ojochal. Motor shut off once on it's own.Gorgeous day and a gorgeous ride Biker energy: 338 Wh; max 427 W

Moving: 01:18, Elapsed: 02:50 EBike: Easy Vuelta de Ojochal con Nancita Biker energy: 98 Wh; max 359 W
Moving: 01:00, Elapsed: 03:20 Stams y Los Gatos Locos con Nancita Night out for beer and nachos.
Moving: 00:39, Elapsed: 01:35 Terraba y regresar Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [7:36]
Moving: 01:50, Elapsed: 03:41 EBike: Uvita para Quebrada Pinuela Biker energy: 129 Wh; max 367 W
Moving: 02:14, Elapsed: 03:32 EBike: Vuelta de Tres Rios y San Buenas con Nancita Biker energy: 190 Wh; max 414 W

Moving: 04:13, Elapsed: 05:27 EBike: Valle del General para Punta Mala Arriba, Calle San Rafael a Cortés Super bueno, BF ride. Drained the battery to 3%. Drained the body to -10%. Stretch ride, and pretty tired coming back up Calle San Rafael. Biker 460 Wh, Motor 680 Wh. Current climbing wattage is 200W to 250W, with 300W being difficult. 5s @ 420W, 30s @ 300W, 60s @275W, 10min @200W. Biker energy: 461 Wh; max 439 W
Moving: 00:58, Elapsed: 02:15 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Tranquilo Easy trail-mode ride to visit Sabrina. Biker energy: 89 Wh; max 405 W
Moving: 02:45, Elapsed: 05:10 EBike: Tortuga Arriba, Pinuela a Uvita, y Regreso por Carretera Nice ride in low ECO mode. Biker 295 Wh, Motor 278 Wh. Biker energy: 303 Wh; max 453 W

Moving: 01:33, Elapsed: 03:02 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal y Playa Tortuga con Nancita Made a sketchy crossing of two rivers which had a wee bit too much water, pero no cocodrilos hoy. Fun ride. Biker energy: 134 Wh; max 394 W
Moving: 00:09, Elapsed: 02:05 EBike: Fase 11 Meeting Biker energy: 38 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 02:47, Elapsed: 03:03 EBike: San Buenaventura, Tres Ríos, Calle Fila Margarita Bad leg day. Hurt locker. Biker energy: 242 Wh; max 399 W

Moving: 03:56, Elapsed: 05:14 EBike: Tres Rios, San Buena Arriba, Chantales 2 iguana verdes, 1 picadura de una abeja. Discovering new routes and exploring roads. Didn't feel great on the bike today, putting out 345Wh, so thank you Levo for your 600Wh. Biker energy: 352 Wh; max 485 W

Moving: 00:12, Elapsed: 00:13 Fase 11, Aborted Ride Tallboy mechanical with freewheel catching and carrying chain with it.
Moving: 00:48, Elapsed: 02:00 EBike: Playa Ventanas y Pancito Just a ride to the beach for a morning swim. Intended to take regular bike, but it had mechanical issues with freewheel catching. Biker energy: 84 Wh; max 412 W

Moving: 01:09, Elapsed: 02:13 EBike: 1 Tropa de Carablancas por la playa Vuelta de Ojochal y Playa Ventanas. Paseo fácil. Una Tropa de Carablancas por la Playa Ventanas Biker energy: 110 Wh; max 346 W
Moving: 03:07, Elapsed: 03:58 EBike: Chontales y Cortés con Nancita Super buen paseo en un día maravilloso. Muy hermoso. Biker energy: 242 Wh; max 441 W
Moving: 00:58, Elapsed: 01:36 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Tranquilo Biker energy: 98 Wh; max 441 W

Moving: 03:13, Elapsed: 04:15 EBike: Uvita, Don Emilio, San Salvador, Uvita Muy buen paseo por algunas buenas caminos para explorar. Super empinado desde San José hasta Don Emilio. 18 a 19˚C por Don Emilio, con llovizna. Biker 375 Wh, spent 26 min at 230W or more Biker energy: 385 Wh; max 465 W
Moving: 01:04, Elapsed: 02:01 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Tranquilo con croissant au chocolat y té negro Biker energy: 103 Wh; max 298 W
Moving: 01:21, Elapsed: 02:14 EBike: Vuleta de Ojochal y Playa Ventanas con Nancita Biker energy: 112 Wh; max 337 W
Sore throat last night, and temperature of 37.3˚ today.
Moving: 00:45, Elapsed: 00:49 EBike: Hermoso Ojochal Tranquilo Primer intento de bici después de una semana de estar enfermo. Biker energy: 44 Wh; max 274 W

Moving: 01:04, Elapsed: 02:46 EBike: Punta Mala y Regreso con Nancita Otra salida tranquila. Biker energy: 83 Wh; max 348 W
Moving: 04:05, Elapsed: 06:15 EBike: Afternoon Ride Biker energy: 246 Wh; max undefined W
Moving: 00:24, Elapsed: 03:05 Vuelta de Ojochal 25 km, 520 m. Still not recovered from cold virus.
Moving: 02:13, Elapsed: 03:11 EBike: Morning Ride Biker energy: 187 Wh; max 393 W
Walk: 2.19km Uvita walk, moving time 00:13
Moving: 01:02, Elapsed: 01:26 EBike: Vuleta de Ojochal Another Levo failure. Biker energy: 100 Wh; max 348 W

Moving: 02:19, Elapsed: 02:56 Ciudad Cortés y Regresar con Bici de Ruta Mucho sol, sin viento, paseo plano. Pero un poco demasiado después de estar enfermo la semana anterior y no salida en bici regular en un tiempo. Entonces demasiado cansado.
Walk: 2.72km National a Hotel Riviera, moving time 00:29
Fly to Miami and then train to Boca Raton to visit Ella and help with her house.
Nancy picks me up at airport. Flew back from Miami to SJO.
Moving: 00:10, Elapsed: 00:19 Uvita short ride 4.57 km. Andre's to Heather's to Andre's to Sushi.

Moving: 01:17, Elapsed: 01:22 EBike: Vuleta de Ojochal y Playa Tortuga Norte Primero paseo desdes el viaje a Florida y reparación de bici por BikeStation. El problema era el cable al sensor magnético, que necesitaba ser reemplazado. Biker energy: 113 Wh; max 443 W
Moving: 01:32, Elapsed: 02:40 EBike: Exploración Ojochal por la Mañana Poach through Fase 5. Biker energy: 132 Wh; max 408 W
Moving: 01:12, Elapsed: 02:28 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal por Fase 5 Vuelta de Ojochal por fase 5. Dia super bonito. El Primero Poach Costarricense de Nancita Biker energy: 101 Wh; max 373 W
Moving: 01:07, Elapsed: 01:51 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal por Fase 5 Mission to clear fallen trees in poach below Fase 5. Biker energy: 93 Wh; max 430 W
Moving: 00:55, Elapsed: 01:40 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal vía Fase 5 Biker energy: 92 Wh; max 391 W
Taxi from David to Paso Canoas, then drive to Golfito and home.
Moving: 01:18, Elapsed: 02:43 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal First post-Panamá ride. Biker energy: 120 Wh; max 386 W
Moving: 00:05, Elapsed: 00:05 EBike: Calle del Jaguar Biker energy: 11 Wh; max 281 W

Moving: 01:20, Elapsed: 01:45 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal vía Fase 5 Nice ride. Stopped for antibiotics for poor Nancita's Panamanian tummy problems. Retired rear Specialized Eliminator 2.6 after 6076 km. Now using Specialized Butcher rear tire. Biker energy: 120 Wh; max 429 W
Moving: 01:24, Elapsed: 02:32 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Paseo agradable con nuevo jantes trasero Biker energy: 132 Wh; max 446 W

Moving: 02:39, Elapsed: 03:12 EBike: Tres Ríos Exploración Perezosa, then exploring up past Tres Rios to Lost Ponds and more. Got caught in a torrential downpour that hit early in the day. But then brand new Butcher got cut. Wah!!! Hiked it then got a lift to Coronado, then got a lift from Nancita. Biker energy: 231 Wh; max 457 W
Moving: 01:15, Elapsed: 02:30 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Biker energy: 113 Wh; max 501 W

Moving: 03:37, Elapsed: 05:02 EBike: 3 pezotes Uvita, Hermosa, Escalares, Dominical, return via Escaleres. Another bike ride, another pair of soaked shoes. Drained the battery, and me. Exploring new terrain. Biker energy: 871 Wh
Moving: 00:58, Elapsed: 02:28 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Visitar la ferretería Biker energy: 103 Wh; max 428 W

Moving: 02:43, Elapsed: 03:42 EBike: 3 carablancas Ciudad Cortés, Calle Alto Bella Vista, San Rafael, Cortés. Lots of work on this one, and a fair bit of unfun steep stuff. Biker energy: 242 Wh; max 432 W
Moving: 01:02, Elapsed: 02:04 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal Biker energy: 132 Wh; max 471 W
Moving: 02:16, Elapsed: 02:22 Perezoso, San Buenas. EBike: Más zapatos mojados Nice ride in trail mode. Rain for last 5km. Biker energy: 213 Wh; max 442 W
Moving: 03:26, Elapsed: 05:37 Ojochal, Quebrada Piñuela, Uvita, Ojochal EBike: No lluvia, pero zapotes mojados por quebrada piñuela Biker energy: 275 Wh; max 375 W
Moving: 01:42, Elapsed: 03:18 Perezoso y Playa Tortuga. 1 Pizote. Rode the regular MTB. Certainly that felt different! Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [15:57]

Moving: 00:09, Elapsed: 00:12 Levo Fails Again Levo TCU goes kaput. Battery bars flicker and control won't put bike into assist modes. Started okay, but failed at 1km into ride.
Moving: 01:01, Elapsed: 01:50 Vuelta de Perezoso con Nancita Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [13:02]
Moving: 01:07, Elapsed: 02:31 4 Carablancas Vuelta de Perezoso. Legs for regular bike are starting to come back. Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [14:41]
Nancy takes bike into Bikestation Lindora.

Moving: 01:13, Elapsed: 02:12 Vuelta de Perezoso Almuerzo a Terraba. No lluvia! Not much energy today (lack of food). Levo is being repaired today at BikeStation Lindora. Up Ojochal Calle del Puente [15:18]
Moving: 01:50, Elapsed: 03:56 Perezoso y Playa Tortuga con Doug Super agradable

Moving: 01:36, Elapsed: 02:35 Vuelta de Ojochal Easy ride on eBike. Meet Doug near Tony's and head back to house. Up Ojochal- Playa Ventanas [12:17], up El Paso de Naomi [3:42] Levo returned via Bike Planet PZ.

Moving: 01:03, Elapsed: 01:09 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal con Doug Biker energy: 250 Wh Mech: Levo problems with battery and closing battery door, so return home and don't use the bike (didn't realize it was the battery door, with error #136 on my Garmin).
Hike: 10.3km Bahia Drake, moving time 02:26

Moving: 01:00, Elapsed: 01:43 EBike: Vuelta de Ojochal vía Fase 5. Tranquilo. Nuevo porton para el poach. Biker energy: 91 Wh; max 410 W Caroline and Doug leave. Mech: Levo problems with battery and closing battery door.

group.note: TOTAL 2020 Moving time: 416 hours Elevation: 151,000 metres Distance: 7187.1

Switched out 9point8 post for Specialized post.
eBike working fine, except it shut off once on it's own while riding.
Tuesday: eBike shut off once on it's own while riding.
Sunday: Levo fails with bad cable to speed sensor magnet.
Away all week, and got Levo repaired at Bike Station Lindora while away.
Levo display beginning to flicker some of the power bars.
Levo failure and out of commission from 29 October until 6 November.
